Dear Colleague,

Please be advised that the Oracle Cloud services outage remains ongoing and has now been further extended by another hour. The updated expected resolution time is now 7:00 PM GST today.

 

________________________________

Updated Outage Window:
üìÖ Date: Monday, 19th May 2025
‚è∞ Time: 11:30 AM ‚Äì 7:00 PM GST

________________________________

 

Service Impact:
The outage continues to primarily affect the Store Inventory Operations Cloud System (SIOCS), resulting in full service downtime throughout this extended window.

 

Known Current Impacts:

*	SIOCS Integration and Application remain unavailable.
*	No inbound or outbound transactions are being processed to/from SIOCS.
*	Sales data is not integrating into SIOCS.
*	While XStore remains operational, please note: 

	*	SIOCS will reflect inaccurate stock levels due to the absence of sales integration and posting from XStore.
	*	Stock deltas are not functioning.
	*	Access to and operations within SIOCS are unavailable.

*	RICS and XOC services remain down.
